posts.content:
for sale is my 72 westy camper.

usa import
poptop
full interior,
minimal welding required..... very minimal.
no engine.
all brakes and running gear was fine before engine was removed when it landed in the uk.

body is nice straight and clean no big rusty patches anywhere. doors shuts are lovely and underneath the bus is very very good.

needs registering and mot.

easy project for someone to get through before show season

6750

07725362442 call or text viewings welcome anytime.
